fixes.name: Delta +10 T
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR useCustom = SELECTEDVALUE('Use Custom Date'[Display As])
VAR endDate = SELECTEDVALUE('End Date'[Display As])
RETURN
IF(
    useCustom,
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Max Date Exclude] = 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE],
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA10],
        0
    ),
    IF(
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[EFFECTIVE_DATE] = endDate,
        'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[DELTA10],
        0
    )
)
fixes.solution_explanation: Replaced Tableau parameter references with SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) and converted nested IF..THEN..ELSE logic into DAX IF expressions. All column references were converted to the 'Risk_GFIRates_Reports_Excel_Rolling (local copy)'[Column] format to match Power BI syntax.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references parameters ([Parameters].[Use Custom Date] and [Parameters].[End Date]); per rules, any formula that uses parameters must be implemented as a measure.
